username.tooltip: Username for signing in to Pohoda

password.tooltip: Password for signing in to Pohoda

url.tooltip: Pohoda mServer URL in format your_url:your_port/xml

headerString.tooltip: Pohoda header string can be found by exporting any document from your Pohoda in XML format and copying the header ( second line ) string from the XML file

entityTypeList.tooltip: Select the entity types you want to import
